text: Ana seli mono nompima, huvempa huno huhagerafi vogisima ante asama hunaraginte tavravemofo avuga, Aroni'ene ne' mofavre naga'amo'za Anumzamofo avurera kinagane nanteranena tavira tagintenkeno tevava nehina, ama'i ana avu'avara Israeli vahe'mota huvava hutma nevinke'za henkama tamagehe'za fore hanamo'za ana zanke hu'za vugahaze.
